status.description:
State of the validator:

  • `not_found` — the specified validator could not be located.
  • `deposited` — the user deposited 32 ETH, and the deposit was processed by the Ethereum Beacon Chain.
  • `pending` — the validator entered a queue for activation.
  • `active_online` — the validator was activated and participating in attesting and proposing blocks.
  • `active_offline` — the validator is offline and not participating in the validator activities.
  • `slashed` — the validator was slashed due to misbehaviors.
  • `exited` — the validator has exited the network and is no longer acting as a validator.

amount.description: Total stake amount for the validator at the moment.

message.default: Validator address is not valid for the specified network

chainId.description: Chain ID this transaction is authorized on, as specified by EIP-155.

type.description: EIP-2718 type of this transaction envelope.

maxFeePerGas.description: Maximum price per unit of gas this transaction will pay for the combined EIP-1559 block's base fee and this transaction's priority fee in Wei.

maxPriorityFeePerGas.description: Price per unit of gas in Wei, which is added to the EIP-1559 block's base fee. This added fee is used to incentivize miners to prioritize this transaction.

location.description: Nodes location. Currently, only `any` is supported.

id.description: Arbitrary UUID. You can later use that UUID to check the status of the set-up operation.

validatorsCount.description: Number of validators. One validator is equal to 32 ETH.

forkVersion.description: Version of the Ethereum fork that the deposit is for.

id.description: UUID that was specified in the node set-up request.

status.description:
Current status of the nodes request:

  • init — node request was created.
  • processing — node request is in work.
  • ready — backend has deposit data for the node request.
  • cancel — something went wrong and the deposit data did not create.

stashAccountAddress.description: Main stash account address which keeps tokens for bonding.

rewardDestinationType.description:
Rewards destination type:

  • `staked` — rewards will be sent to your Stash account and added to your current bond (compounding rewards).
  • `stash` — rewards will be sent to your Stash account as transferrable balance (not compounding rewards).
  • `controller` — rewards will be sent to the controller account.
  • `account` — rewards will be sent to any account you specify as transferrable balance.
